snippet: Wang Caipang, a 30-year-old financier who caused large losses in a rogue gold trading scandal, has been sentenced to death by a Chinese court, according to Britain's Daily Mail. Also embroiled in the scandal is Ms. Wang's brother, Wang Guanglin, who...
abstract: Wang Caipang, a 30-year-old financier who caused large losses in a rogue gold trading scandal, has been sentenced to death by a Chinese court, according to Britain's Daily Mail. Also embroiled in the scandal is Ms. Wang's brother, Wang Guanglin, who is still at large.

headline.main: Chinese Rogue Trader Gets Death Sentence
